task.summary: always read multiple bits from the current byte
Add reading a set of bits as a new stream
add index property which functions with sub streams
make length property work correctly with substreams
allow node buffer as contructor argument in typings

use Buffer.from instead of new Buffer
Fixes #11

Version 0.1.0
- add read/writeBoolean - add read/writeUTF8String - add readBitStream/readArrayBuffer - add bitsLeft, length and index properties - improve read performance
